name: Airtable (npx)
description: Interact with Airtable bases, tables, and records. List schemas, search records, create and update data, and manage comments.

inputs.label: Airtable Personal Access Token
inputs.description: Personal Access Token for the Airtable API. Requires schema.bases:read and data.records:read scopes at minimum.

obtain.instructions:
1. Go to airtable.com/create/tokens
2. Click '+ Create new token'
3. Add scopes: schema.bases:read, data.records:read (and write scopes if needed)
4. Select which bases the token can access
5. Click 'Create token' and copy it

auth.instructions: Create a Personal Access Token at https://airtable.com/create/tokens
